quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years. - Abraham Lincoln
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. - John Lennon
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. - Steve Jobs
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: May the Force be with you. - Star Wars
quotes.author: Star Wars

quotes.text: Here's looking at you, kid. - Casablanca
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.text: You can't handle the truth! - A Few Good Men
quotes.author: A Few Good Men

quotes.text: Life is like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get. - Forrest Gump
quotes.author: Forrest Gump

quotes.text: I'll be back. - The Terminator
quotes.author: The Terminator

quotes.text: Houston, we have a problem. - Apollo 13
quotes.author: Apollo 13

quotes.text: To infinity and beyond! - Toy Story
quotes.author: Toy Story

quotes.text: Just keep swimming. - Finding Nemo
quotes.author: Finding Nemo

quotes.text: I see dead people. - The Sixth Sense
quotes.author: The Sixth Sense

quotes.text: Why so serious? - The Dark Knight
quotes.author: The Dark Knight

quotes.text: You're gonna need a bigger boat. - Jaws
quotes.author: Jaws
